This offer is designed to be mutually beneficial, allowing you to secure a valuable asset while also providing me with a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,300,000. 
You have three options:
